getHtml

public java.lang.String getHtml()
Description copied from interface: HardwareResource
Returns the html description of this hardware resource. It is recommended to use get/setHtmlUrl(...) instead but is provided as a matter of convenience. This method is used by the ResourceBrowserPortlet to present an html description of a hardware resource.

Specified by:
getHtml in interface HardwareResource
Returns:
The html description

setHtml

public void setHtml(java.lang.String html)
Description copied from interface: HardwareResource
Sets the html description of this hardware resource.

Specified by:
setHtml in interface HardwareResource
Parameters:
html - The html description

getHtmlUrl

public java.lang.String getHtmlUrl()
Description copied from interface: HardwareResource
Returns the path to a file containing an html description of this hardware resource. This is recommended over using get/setHtml(...), because it keeps the resource registry file clean of too much clutter. This method is used by the ResourceBrowserPortlet to present an html description of a hardware resource.

Specified by:
getHtmlUrl in interface HardwareResource
Returns:
The html description

setHtmlUrl

public void setHtmlUrl(java.lang.String htmlUrl)
Description copied from interface: HardwareResource
Sets the path to a file containing an html description of this hardware resource. This is recommended over using get/setHtml(...), because it keeps the resource registry file clean of too much clutter. The url must be relative to the gridportlets web appliction directory (e.g., gridportlets/WEB-INF/html/) since gridportlets will perform a jsp include to render the html.

Specified by:
setHtmlUrl in interface HardwareResource
Parameters:
htmlUrl - The path to a file containing html description
